00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 enum outlets{
00013         k_outlet_value = 0,
00014         k_outlet_dumpout,
00015         num_outlets
00016 };
00017 
00018 
00022 typedef struct _ramp{
00023         t_object         ob;                                    
00024         void            *obex;                                  
00025         void            *outlets[num_outlets];  
00026         t_symbol        *attr_rampunit;                 
00027         RampUnit        *rampUnit;                              
00028 } t_ramp;

00064 void            ramp_int(t_ramp *x, long n);

00089 /************************************************************************************/
00090 // Class Definition
00091 
00092 int main(void)                          // main receives a copy of the Max function macros table
00093 {
00094         t_class *c;
00095         
00096         jamoma_init();
00097 
00098         // Define our class
00099         c = class_new("jcom.ramp",(method)ramp_new, (method)ramp_free, (short)sizeof(t_ramp), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00100         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_ramp, obex));
00101         
00102         // Make methods accessible for our class:
00103         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_bang,                                   "bang",                                 0);
00104         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_int,                                    "int",                                  A_DEFLONG,      0);
00105         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_float,                                  "float",                                A_DEFFLOAT,     0);
00106         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_list,                                   "list",                                 A_GIMME,        0);
00107         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_set,                                    "set",                                  A_GIMME,        0);
00108         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_attrset,                                "attrset",                              A_GIMME,        0);
00109         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_attrget,                                "attrget",                              A_GIMME,        0);
00110         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_setFunction,                    "function",                             A_SYM,          0);
00111         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_getFunctionParameter,   "function.parameter.get",       A_GIMME,        0);
00112         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_setFunctionParameter,   "function.parameter",   A_GIMME,        0);
00113         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_clock,                                  "clock",                                A_SYM,          0);
00114         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_assist,                                 "assist",                               A_CANT,         0); 
00115     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,                     "dumpout",                              A_CANT,         0);  
00116     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,            "quickref",                             A_CANT,         0);
00117 
00118         // ATTRIBUTE: rampunit
00119         class_addattr(c, 
00120                 attr_offset_new("drive", _sym_symbol, 0,
00121                 (method)0, (method)ramp_setrampunit, calcoffset(t_ramp, attr_rampunit)));
00122 
00123         // Finalize our class
00124         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00125         ramp_class = c;
00126         
00127         return 0;
00128 }
00129

00131 /************************************************************************************/
00132 // Object Life
00133 
00134 void *ramp_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00135 {
00136         t_ramp  *x = (t_ramp *)object_alloc(ramp_class);
00137         t_atom  a;
00138 
00139         if(x){
00140                 x->outlets[k_outlet_dumpout] = outlet_new(x, 0L);
00141                 x->outlets[k_outlet_value]   = outlet_new(x, 0L);
00142                 object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (t_object *)x->outlets[k_outlet_dumpout]);
00143 
00144                 x->rampUnit = NULL;
00145                 x->attr_rampunit = _sym_nothing;                
00146                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);       // handle attribute args
00147 
00148                 if(x->attr_rampunit == _sym_nothing){
00149                         atom_setsym(&a, gensym("scheduler"));
00150                         object_attr_setvalueof(x, gensym("drive"), 1, &a);
00151                 }
00152         }
00153         return (x);             // return the pointer to our new instantiation
00154 }
00155 
00156 
00157 void ramp_free(t_ramp *x)
00158 {
00159         delete x->rampUnit;
00160 }

00163 /************************************************************************************/
00164 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00165 
00166 // Method for Assistance Messages
00167 void ramp_assist(t_ramp *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00168 {
00169         if(msg==1)                                              // Inlet
00170                 strcpy(dst, "input");
00171         else{                                                   // Outlets
00172                 switch(arg){
00173                         case k_outlet_value:
00174                                         strcpy(dst, "ramping value");
00175                                         break;
00176                         case k_outlet_dumpout:
00177                                         strcpy(dst, "dumpout");
00178                                         break;
00179                 }
00180         }               
00181 }

00184 void ramp_setFunction(t_ramp *x, t_symbol *functionName)
00185 {
00186         x->rampUnit->setAttributeValue(TT("function"), TT(functionName->s_name));  
00187 }

00189 
00190 void ramp_getFunctionParameter(t_ramp *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00191 {
00192         t_atom          *a;
00193         TTSymbol        parameterName;
00194         TTValue         parameterValue;
00195         int                     numValues;
00196         int                     i;
00197         TTSymbol        tempSymbol;
00198         double          tempValue;
00199         
00200         if(!argc){
00201                 error("jcom.ramp: not enough arguments to function.parameter.get");
00202                 return;
00203         }
00204         
00205         parameterName = atom_getsym(argv)->s_name;
00206         obj->rampUnit->getFunctionParameterValue(parameterName, parameterValue);
00207         numValues = parameterValue.getNumValues();
00208         if(numValues){
00209                 a = (t_atom *)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom) * (numValues+1));
00210                 // First list item is name of parameter
00211                 atom_setsym(a, gensym(parameterName));
00212                 // Next the whole shebang is copied
00213                 for(i=0; i<numValues; i++){
00214                         if(parameterValue.getType(i) == kTypeSymbol){
00215                                 parameterValue.get(i, tempSymbol);
00216                                 atom_setsym(a+i+1, gensym(tempSymbol));
00217                         }
00218                         else{
00219                                 parameterValue.get(i, tempValue);
00220                                 atom_setfloat(a+i+1, tempValue);
00221                         }
00222                 }
00223                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("function.parameter.get"), numValues+1, a);
00224         
00225                 // The pointer to an atom assign in the getParameter method needs to be freed.
00226                 sysmem_freeptr(a);
00227         }
00228 }
00229 
00230 
00231 void ramp_setFunctionParameter(t_ramp *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00232 {
00233         TTSymbol        parameterName;
00234         TTValue         newValue;
00235         int                     i;
00236         
00237         if(argc < 2){
00238                 error("jcom.map: not enough arguments to setParameter");
00239                 return;
00240         }
00241         
00242         parameterName = atom_getsym(argv)->s_name;
00243         for(i=1; i<=(argc-1); i++){
00244                 if(argv[i].a_type == A_SYM)
00245                         newValue.append(TT(atom_getsym(argv+1)->s_name));
00246                 else
00247                         newValue.append(atom_getfloat(argv+i));
00248         }
00249         obj->rampUnit->setFunctionParameterValue(parameterName, newValue);
00250 }

00254 // ATTRIBUTE: set rampunit
00255 t_max_err ramp_setrampunit(t_ramp *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00256 {
00257         x->attr_rampunit = atom_getsym(argv);
00258         RampLib::createUnit(TT(x->attr_rampunit->s_name), &x->rampUnit, ramp_callback, (void *)x);
00259         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00260 }

00263 void ramp_clock(t_ramp *x, t_symbol *clockName)
00264 {
00265         x->rampUnit->setAttributeValue(TT("clock"), TT(clockName->s_name));
00266 }

00268 
00269 // Triggered by our Ramp Unit's tick function
00270 void ramp_callback(void *v, short numvalues, double *values)
00271 {       
00272         t_ramp  *x = (t_ramp *)v;
00273         t_atom  *a = (t_atom *)malloc(numvalues * sizeof(t_atom));
00274         short   i;
00275         
00276         for(i=0; i<numvalues; i++)
00277                 atom_setfloat(a+i, values[i]);
00278                 
00279         if(numvalues == 1)
00280                 outlet_float(x->outlets[k_outlet_value], values[0]);
00281         else
00282                 outlet_anything(x->outlets[k_outlet_value], _sym_list, numvalues, a);
00283                 
00284         free(a);
00285 }
00286 
00287 
00288 // BANG -- fire an output -- useful for the async unit
00289 void ramp_bang(t_ramp *x)
00290 {
00291         x->rampUnit->tick();
00292 }

00295 // INT INPUT
00296 void ramp_int(t_ramp *x, long value)
00297 {
00298         double dval = value;
00299         
00300         x->rampUnit->set(1, &dval);
00301         outlet_float(x->outlets[k_outlet_value], value);
00302 }
00303 
00304 
00305 // FLOAT INPUT
00306 void ramp_float(t_ramp *x, double value)
00307 {
00308         x->rampUnit->set(1, &value);
00309         outlet_float(x->outlets[k_outlet_value], value);
00310 }

00312 
00313 // SET FLOAT INPUT
00314 void ramp_set(t_ramp *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00315 {
00316         double  *values;
00317         short   i;
00318         
00319         values = (double *)malloc(argc * sizeof(double));
00320 
00321         for(i=0; i<argc; i++)
00322                 values[i] = atom_getfloat(argv+i);
00323 
00324         x->rampUnit->set(argc, values);
00325         free(values);
00326 }
00327 
00328 
00329 // LIST INPUT <value, ramptime>
00330 void ramp_list(t_ramp *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00331 {
00332         short   i;
00333         short   ramp_keyword_index = -1;
00334         double  *values;
00335         
00336         if(argc < 3){
00337                 error("invalid syntax -- not enough args to ramp");
00338                 return;
00339         }
00340 
00341         values = (double *)malloc((argc-2) * sizeof(double));
00342         
00343         for(i=0; i<argc; i++){
00344                 if(argv[i].a_type == A_SYM){
00345                         if(atom_getsym(argv+i) == gensym("ramp")){
00346                                 ramp_keyword_index = i;
00347                                 break;
00348                         }
00349                 }
00350                 values[i] = atom_getfloat(argv+i);
00351         }
00352         
00353         if(argc != (ramp_keyword_index + 2)){
00354                 error("invalid syntax -- missing 'ramp' keyword or wrong args following the 'ramp' keyword");
00355                 return;
00356         }
00357         
00358         x->rampUnit->go(argc-2, values, atom_getfloat(argv+ramp_keyword_index+1));
00359         free(values);
00360 }
00361

00363 // RAMP UNIT ATTRIBUTES
00364 void ramp_attrset(t_ramp *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00365 {
00366         TTSymbol        parameterName;
00367         TTValue         newValue;
00368         int                     i;
00369         
00370         if(argc < 2){
00371                 error("jcom.ramp: not enough arguments to setParameter");
00372                 return;
00373         }
00374         
00375         parameterName = atom_getsym(argv)->s_name;
00376         for(i=1; i<=(argc-1); i++){
00377                 if(argv[i].a_type == A_SYM)
00378                         newValue.append(TT(atom_getsym(argv+1)->s_name));
00379                 else
00380                         newValue.append(atom_getfloat(argv+i));
00381         }
00382         x->rampUnit->setAttributeValue(parameterName, newValue);
00383 }

00385 
00386 void ramp_attrget(t_ramp *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00387 {
00388         t_atom          *a;
00389         TTSymbol        parameterName;
00390         TTValue         parameterValue;
00391         int                     numValues;
00392         int                     i;
00393         TTSymbol        tempSymbol;
00394         double          tempValue;
00395         
00396         if(!argc){
00397                 error("jcom.ramp: not enough arguments to parameter.get");
00398                 return;
00399         }
00400         
00401         parameterName = atom_getsym(argv)->s_name;
00402         x->rampUnit->getAttributeValue(parameterName, parameterValue);
00403         numValues = parameterValue.getNumValues();
00404 
00405         if(numValues){
00406                 a = (t_atom *)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom) * (numValues+1));
00407                 // First list item is name of parameter
00408                 atom_setsym(a, gensym(parameterName));
00409                 // Next the whole shebang is copied
00410                 for(i=0; i<numValues; i++){
00411                         if(parameterValue.getType(i) == kTypeSymbol){
00412                                 parameterValue.get(i, tempSymbol);
00413                                 atom_setsym(a+i+1, gensym(tempSymbol));
00414                         }
00415                         else{
00416                                 parameterValue.get(i, tempValue);
00417                                 atom_setfloat(a+i+1, tempValue);
00418                         }
00419                 }
00420                 object_obex_dumpout(x, gensym("current.parameter"), numValues+1, a);
00421         
00422                 // The pointer to an atom assign in the getParameter method needs to be freed.
00423                 sysmem_freeptr(a);
00424         }
00425 }
